title: Authentic to read Dua 33 times & Surah Waqiah for increase in provision?
transcript: aisha from singapore she says someone told us that to say 33 times would increase in your provision so is this authentic the answer is no this is not authentic and it's baseless and likewise it's basis what a lot of the people in the subcontinent think that reciting suratul every day would prevent you from falling into poverty this is totally not true at all
